comments: This worksheet shows how to create required questions with information that they are required below field.
required defines that field is required
display.hint is used to dispaly small text below the field
validation_tags are used to tag groups of fields that we want to validate
To check if value was already entered by user we need to get value of field. To do so we use 'data('name_of_field') == null' that checks it
In forms we can use css and html attribiutes. Here it is used div with "req" class that is defined in css file(example file in form folder). This file must always have name "customStyles"
We can also use calcutions defined in calculates worksheet. Here is an example that show us if user is an adult yet or not.
It is possible to display data that user already filled in. To do so we use {{data.x}} where x is the name of the field where data was collected
begin screen and end screen are used to defined the begin and end of the screen if we want to have multiple fields on one screen.

text.default: How much is your monthly salary?
Do you have an unpaid job?
How much do you sell weekly?
How much are your weekly expenses?
How many people live in your house?
How many people earn money in your home?
text.spanish: ¿Cuántas personas ganan plata en su casa?

text.default: How many people are under 18 years old in your house?
text.spanish: ¿Cuántas personas son menores a 18 años en su casa?
